sources.title: One Minute To Zero (1952) Robert Mitchum Â· Ann Blyth
sources.description: An American colonel is tasked with evacuating civilian refugees during the Korean War ; he finds himself torn between his human and military duties..

metadata.Plot: Wartime drama about an idealistic young UN official (Ann Blyth) who finds out about the horrors of war when she falls in love with Colonel Steve Janowski (Robert Mitchum), the officer in charge of evacuating citizens from Korea.
metadata.Writer: Milton Krims, William Wister Haines, Andrew Solt
metadata.Actors: Robert Mitchum, Ann Blyth, William Talman
